contents.text: Welcome to Mailgun, based in San Francisco, offering powerful APIs that let you send, receive, and track email effortlessly.
For sales and new account inquiries, press 1.
To speak with a sales representative, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Speak with a sales rep about setting up a new Mailgun account for our team
I’d like to speak with a sales representative about setting up an account for my veteran-run nonprofit.
Connect with a sales rep to discuss provisioning a new Mailgun API enterprise account.
I’d like to speak with someone about setting up a new Mailgun account.
I’d like to speak with a sales rep about setting up a new Mailgun account for our physics research group’s newsletter.

contents.text: For information on pricing and plans, press 2.
Please hold while we provide details on our pricing and plans.

navigationGoals: Get a detailed pricing breakdown to choose the right Mailgun subscription
I need details on your pricing plans and available nonprofit or veteran discounts.
Get a breakdown of Mailgun’s pricing tiers and plan feature limits for high-volume email.
I need information on your available plans and their costs.
I want details on Mailgun’s pricing tiers so I can pick the right plan for sending weekly lab reports.

contents.text: For technical support and account services, press 2.
For API integration and technical assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Connect with a technical engineer to integrate Mailgun’s API into our application
I need technical assistance integrating the Mailgun API into my website.
Troubleshoot API integration errors with a technical support engineer.
I’m having trouble integrating the email API and need technical help.
I need help integrating Mailgun’s API with my Python script to automate email alerts for experiment results.

contents.text: For billing and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to the billing department.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing discrepancy on my latest Mailgun invoice
I want to resolve a billing issue and apply my veteran discount to my invoice.
Review my latest invoice details and update my billing payment method.
I have questions about my recent bill and need help understanding the charges.
I’d like to update my billing info and review my current charges for our account.
